section.title: List Projects
section.para: To access the master list of Projects, select the "Projects" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Projects" screen displays information on all existing Projects, including Project Number, Project name, and Project status.
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for creating a new Project.

Enables you to edit highlighted Projects. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Project--except that when editing, the fields will contain Project information. Double-clicking on a Project line will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Project and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Project and then select this button to remove the Project from the master list
